Are you an agency or small business owner looking for a copywriter?

How do you write effective copy?

You'll read all over the internet that you have X number of seconds to catch the attention of your reader. I’m sure one of those numbers is correct, but the simpler and true answer is: you need to catch them with your headline, and then you need to re-catch them with the next line, and the next line, and followed by (you guessed it) the next line.

So how do you keep a reader engaged line-by-line and convince them to do whatever you’re asking them to do (buy a product, buy your services, donate to a cause)? You fail a lot until you figure out what works—or you just hire someone like me who’s already done that.

So how do I make copywriting easy for you? There are only 6 steps, and you only need to do the 2 easiest ones. Let's start with what I'll deliver:

WHAT YOU'LL GET

Receive copy that cuts through the static and erases customer objections. Enjoy the peace of mind knowing your website’s copy is going to start working for you.

REVISIONS

I’m not satisfied until you are, and I check my ego at the door. I’ll work with you to make sure your copy matches your brand’s voice.

RECEIVE YOUR FIRST DRAFT

I provide you with a first draft early to make sure we’re headed in the right direction; open communication is the key to our success.

GIVE KEN EVERYTHING YOU HAVE

I need it all: product descriptions, customer reviews, napkins you wrote ideas down on. To give you copy that we both love, I need to understand your product/business as well as you do.

CONSULTATION & QUOTE

We’ll meet over the phone or via Zoom (whichever you prefer) to discuss your product/business and your goals. Initial consultations are 1 hour and free.

CONTACT KEN

Fill out the form below, and hear back from me within 24 hours!
